meta.content: Education; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: A front-page article on Tuesday about the heavy debt incurred by culinary students who rely on student loans misstated the name of the California school attended by a student who returned to New York to help pay her bills. It is the California Culinary Academy, not the California Culinary Institute. Because of an editing error, the article also misstated the format of the ShawGuides to culinary schools. It is published online; it is no longer a book.

A front-page article on Tuesday about the heavy debt incurred by culinary students who rely on student loans misstated the name of the California school attended by a student who returned to New York to help pay her bills. It is published online; it is no longer a book.
